item.title: Cybersecurity Learning Resources
item.description: A list of resources that I use to teach myself cybersecurity and recommend. Malware Analysis / Reverse Engineering Online courses Zero2Automated - Advanced Malware Analysis - In progress OpenSecurityTraining2 Reverse Engineering 3201: Symbolic Analysis - July 2023 Reverse Engineering 3011: Reversing C++ Binaries - July 2023 Architecture 1001: x86-64 Assembly - July 2023 Sektor7 RED TEAM Operator: Malware Development Intermediate - May 2023 RED TEAM Operator: Malware Development Essentials - April 2023 TCM Security - Practical Malware Analysis & Triage - February 2023 Books Practical Reverse Engineering by Bruce Dang et al.
